class_notes: (Prerequisite: BL 511 or equivalent) (ONLINE: synchronous live sessions T/Th 8:00am-9:20am)
course_description: Continuation of BL511, with an emphasis on reading the Old Testament in Hebrew. Standard reference works for biblical exegesis will be presented. The course will culminate in extended reading, with some exegetical treatment, of small books in the Old Testament.
prerequisites: This requirement mandates BL511 as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 5138, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 8-9:20a, Instructor: E. Bassett, Status: Open
